lines.text: I wish they wouldn't say that.
Bashing fags doesn't stop you from becoming one.
[as Tony has five teenaged homophobes put down their bats]
Shoot 'em, Tony. Shoot the little bitches.

[comforts him]
No, I couldn't do that, honey, because if I did that, iy would be a very good career move.
Well, it's a good thing I don't have that gun - 'cause they'd be some sorry-ass little bitches.
[as Tony has five teenaged homophobes put down their bats]
Shoot 'em, Tony. Shoot the little bitches.

[comforts him]
No, I couldn't do that, honey, because if I did that, it would be a very good career move.
Well, it's a good thing I don't have that gun - 'cause they'd be some sorry-ass little bitches.
